price: Thereupon she pointed to him. They said, “How can we talk to someone who is still a baby in the cradle?”
arabic: فَأَشَارَتۡ إِلَيۡهِۖ قَالُواْ كَيۡفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ صَبِيّٗا
